column2: Bank error in your favor. Collect $200.
From sale of stock you get $50.
Get Out of Jail Free. {Get out of Jail, Free. in previous US editions}
Go to Jail. Go directly to jail. Do not pass Go, Do not collect $200.
Collect $50 from every player for opening night seats.
It is {It's} your birthday. Collect $10 from every player.
Hospital Fees. Pay $50. {Pay hospital fees of $100.} {Pay hospital $100.}
School fees. Pay $50. {Pay school fees {tax} of $150}
You are assessed for street repairs: Pay $40 per house and $115 per hotel you own.
You have won second prize in a beauty contest. Collect $10.
